## Description

Fit the continuous-time vector autoregressive model using the `OpenMx` package.

## Installation

You can install the released version of
`fitCTVARMx`
from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/fitCTVARMx) with:

```r
if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/fitCTVARMx")
```

## More Information

See
[GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/fitCTVARMx)
for package documentation.
